ygData.subject: Re: New to this club
ygData.msgSnippet: OK, I got the Everquest and am thnking of a Half Elf character, either a Druid, Ranger or Paladin. Which would be the best starting city for each, or does it
ygData.messageBody:
OK, I got the Everquest and am thnking of a Half
Elf character, either a Druid, Ranger or Paladin.
Which would be the best starting city for each, or does
it make a difference? Also, I am looking for
feedback on different servers. I do not want PvP, so I
know which ones to not start with; someone on Bertox
(I think) was awfully nice to me, but does that mean
I would have to be a follower of the evil god it is
based on? And I understand that Fennin Ro was te first
"role playing server, but I thought the whole EQ game
was roleplaying? I would not mind the servers where a
lot of German players play.Ionly know enough German
to get myself into (but not out of) trouble, but I
am certainly not intimidated by it. Any thoughts
would be appreciated.
